title: The Inquisition; Religious Persecution - Collection 7
description:
The Inquisition; Religious Persecution - Collection 7:

We have 26 titles here:

-  Baigent & Leigh - The Inquisition (1999)

-  Brill Publishing Renaissance Inquisitors, Dominican Inquisitors and Inquisitorial Districts in Northern Italy 1474-1527 (2007)

-  Costigan - Through Cracks in the Wall; Modern Inquisitions and New Christian Letrados in the Iberian Atlantic World (2010)

-  Deane -  A History of Medieval Heresy and Inquisition (2011)

-  Frassetto - Heretic Lives; Medieval Heresy from Bogomil and the Cathars to Wyclif and Hus (2007)

-  Frassetto (Ed.) - Heresy and the Persecuting Society in the Middle Ages; Essays on the Work of R.I. Moore (2006)

-  Gatti - Essays on Giordano Bruno (2011)

-  Green - Inquisition; the Reign of Fear (2007)

-  Ingram (Ed.) - The Conversos and Moriscos in Late Medieval Spain and Beyond, Vol. 1; Departures and Change (2009)

-  Magnier - Pedro de Valencia and the Catholic Apologists of the Expulsion of the Moriscos (2010)

-  Martin - The Cathars; The Most Successful Heresy of the Middle Ages (2005)

-  Mostefai & Scott (Eds.) - Rousseau and L'Infame; Religion, Toleration, and Fanaticism in the Age of Enlightenment (2009)

-  Murphy - God's Jury; the Inquisition and the Making of the Modern World (2012)

-  O'Shea - The Perfect Heresy; the Revolutionary Life and Death of the Medieval Cathars (2001)

-  Peirce - The Western Inquisition (1720)

-  Perry - The Handless Maiden; Moriscos and the Politics of Religion in Early Modern Spain (2005)

-  Pick - Conflict and Coexistence; Archbishop Rodrigo and the Muslims and Jews in Medieval Spain (2004)

-  Puigblanch - The Inquisition Unmasked; Being an Historical and Philosophical Account, Vol. I (1816)

-  Puigblanch - The Inquisition Unmasked; Being an Historical and Philosophical Account, Vol. II (1816)

-  Rawlings - The Spanish Inquisition (2006)

-  Smith - Crusade, Heresy and Inquisition in the Lands of the Crown of Aragon, 1167-1276 (2010)

-  Soyer - The Persecution of the Jews and Muslims of Portugal (2007)

-  Thomsett - Heresy in the Roman Catholic Church; a History (2011)

-  Thomsett - The Inquisition; a History (2010)

-  Wakefield & Evans - Heresies of the High Middle Ages; selected sources, translated and annotated (1991)

-  Walker - Doctors, Folk Medicine and the Inquisition; the Repression of Magical Healing in Portugal During the Enlightenment (2005)
